name: Ymir
description: Ymir is a 4X multiplayer strategy game combined with a city builder where each player develops a civilization of pigmen starting at the stone age.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 8 Processor: Intel core i5 Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: AMD Radeon HD 7800, screen resolution 1920x1080 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 2 GB available space
